page.title: 11BOTTISHAM VILLAGE COLLEGE
page.content: Bottisham V.C. was opened in 1937,took two years to build and was funded by Mr. Henry Morris.980 pupils will attend the college (a new school record)aged from 11_16 and they come from 16 local primary schools.When they leave at 15_16 about 115 go to Sixth Form College in Cambridge. School starts at 8.45am and ends at 3.55pm.Dining arrangements are cafeteria and/or packed meal. Misbehaviour is punished by Half and/or Whole Sets,Detentions six different reports or suspension. Awards:Form Points Merit Marks and Commendations.Homework is set to help pupils work on their own.60 teachers teach 20 subjects to classes of about 30 pupils in around 50 classrooms. Work may lead to school trips.
